org.hps.analysis.hodoscope

Class HodoscopePlotsDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.readout.ReadoutDriver
        • org.hps.analysis.hodoscope.HodoscopePlotsDriver

  • public class HodoscopePlotsDriver
extends ReadoutDriver
    HodoscopePlotsDriver creates plots for the energy and position distributions of SLIC truth hodoscope hits, preprocessed hodoscope hits, and digitized, converted hodoscope hits. Included are plots of varying levels of specificity, from general all hits plots to per-channel plots.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.lcsim.util.Driver

        Driver.AbortRunException, Driver.NextEventException

      • getTimeDisplacement

        protected double getTimeDisplacement()
        Description copied from class: ReadoutDriver
        Specifies the amount of simulation time that the driver needs to produce its output. This indicates that the driver's present output was generated based on input a time equal to (getCurrentTime() - getTimeDisplacement()).
        Specified by:
        getTimeDisplacement in class ReadoutDriver
        Returns:
        Returns the time displacement of output data as a double.

      • getTimeNeededForLocalOutput

        Specified by:
        getTimeNeededForLocalOutput in class ReadoutDriver
        Returns:

      • fillPlots

        private final <T> void fillPlots(int typeID,
                                 Collection<T> hits,
                                 Class<T> objectType)
                          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Fills all of the plots of type typeID for the specified collection of hits.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The object class of the hits.
        Parameters:
        typeID - - The type of plots to fill. May only be one of TYPE_TRUTH, TYPE_PREPROCESSED, or TYPE_DIGITIZED.
        hits - - The hits with which to populate the plots. These may be only of type CalorimeterHit, SimCalorimeterHit, or SimTrackerHit.
        objectType - - The Class object for the hits' object class.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Occurs if an unsupported type ID or hit class is given.

      • fillPlots

        private static final void fillPlots(int typeID,
                                    int ix,
                                    int topBot,
                                    int layer,
                                    int hole,
                                    double energy)
                             throws IllegalArgumentException
        Fills the plots of the type typeID for a hit with an energy energy GeV and occurring on the indicated scintillator.
        Parameters:
        typeID - - The type of plots to fill. May only be one of TYPE_TRUTH, TYPE_PREPROCESSED, or TYPE_DIGITIZED.
        ix - - The x-index of the scintillator.
        topBot - - Whether the hit occurs on the top or bottom of the hodoscope. This must correspond to either TOP or BOT.
        layer - - Whether the hit occurs on layer 1 or layer 2. This must correspond to either L1 or L2.
        hole - - Which optic fiber hole in the scintillator is the plot is for. This must correspond to either HOLE1 HOLE2, or HOLE_NULL.
        energy - - The energy of the hit in GeV.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Occurs if layer, topBot, typeID, hole are not supported values.

      • getEnergy

        private static final Double getEnergy(CalorimeterHit hit)
        Gets the energy for a CalorimeterHit object. This method is used as part of the fillPlots(int, Collection, Class) method.
        Parameters:
        hit - - The hit.
        Returns:
        Returns the energy in GeV.
        See Also:

      • getEnergyDistPlotName

        private static final String getEnergyDistPlotName(int typeID)
                                           throws IllegalArgumentException
        Gets the name of the "all hits" energy plot for the indicated plot type.
        Parameters:
        typeID - - The type ID of the plot. May only be one of TYPE_TRUTH, TYPE_PREPROCESSED, or TYPE_DIGITIZED.
        Returns:
        Returns the plot name.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Occurs if typeID is not a supported value.

      • getEnergyDistPlotName

        private static final String getEnergyDistPlotName(int typeID,
                                                  int topBot,
                                                  int layer)
                                           throws IllegalArgumentException
        Gets the name of the "top/bottom and layer hits" plots for the indicated plot type and top/bottom and layer combination.
        Parameters:
        typeID - - The type ID of the plot. May only be one of TYPE_TRUTH, TYPE_PREPROCESSED, or TYPE_DIGITIZED.
        topBot - - Whether the plot is for the top or bottom of the hodoscope. This must correspond to either TOP or BOT.
        layer - - Whether the plot is for layer 1 or layer 2. This must correspond to either L1 or L2.
        Returns:
        Returns the plot name.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Occurs if typeID, topBot, or layer is not a supported value.

      • getEnergyDistPlotName

        private static final String getEnergyDistPlotName(int typeID,
                                                  int ix,
                                                  int topBot,
                                                  int layer,
                                                  int hole)
                                           throws IllegalArgumentException
        Gets the plot name for the "specific scintillator" plots for a given scintillator.
        Parameters:
        typeID - - The type ID of the plot. May only be one of TYPE_TRUTH, TYPE_PREPROCESSED, or TYPE_DIGITIZED.
        ix - - The x-index of the scintillator.
        topBot - - Whether the plot is for the top or bottom of the hodoscope. This must correspond to either TOP or BOT.
        layer - - Whether the plot is for layer 1 or layer 2. This must correspond to either L1 or L2.
        hole - - Which optic fiber hole in the scintillator is the plot is for. This must correspond to either HOLE1 HOLE2, or HOLE_NULL.
        Returns:
        Returns the plot name.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Occurs if typeID, topBot, layer, or hole is not a supported value.

      • getIndices

        private final int[] getIndices(CalorimeterHit hit)
        Gets the indices for a CalorimeterHit object. This method is used as part of the fillPlots(int, Collection, Class) method.
        Parameters:
        hit - - The hit.
        Returns:
        Returns the indices in the form of { x-index, top/bottom, layer, hole number }.
        See Also:
        fillPlots(int, Collection, Class)

                                                    int layer)
                                             throws IllegalArgumentException
